title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Reorganized Copilot documentation structure into new directories: agents, context, and prompting.
Moved coding agent and code review content under agents directory.
Consolidated context-related files (MCP, spaces, indexing, exclusion, knowledge bases) under context directory.
Created new prompting section for prompt engineering and response customization.
Updated knowledge bases deprecation date to November 1, 2025.
Added audience frontmatter support for targeted content.
Implemented redirects for moved files to maintain backward compatibility.
summary:
- Reorganized Copilot documentation structure into new directories: agents, context, and prompting.
- Moved coding agent and code review content under agents directory.
- Consolidated context-related files (MCP, spaces, indexing, exclusion, knowledge bases) under context directory.
- Created new prompting section for prompt engineering and response customization.
- Updated knowledge bases deprecation date to November 1, 2025.
- Added audience frontmatter support for targeted content.
- Implemented redirects for moved files to maintain backward compatibility.
generated_title: Reorganize Copilot documentation structure and update content

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Reorganized Copilot documentation structure into new directories: agents, context, and prompting.
- Moved coding agent and code review content under agents directory.
- Consolidated context-related files (MCP, spaces, indexing, exclusion, knowledge bases) under context directory.
- Created new prompting section for prompt engineering and response customization.
- Updated knowledge bases deprecation date to November 1, 2025.
- Added audience frontmatter support for targeted content.
- Implemented redirects for moved files to maintain backward compatibility.

### Title
Reorganize Copilot documentation structure and update content
